verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
There is glory
Mighty Working Power
At work in me
There is glory
Mighty Working Power
At Work in me
In the Holy Ghost

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
My hands they heal
My ears they hear
My eyes they see
In the Holy Ghost

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
In the Holy Ghost
In the Holy Ghost
In the Holy Ghost
In the Holy Ghost
